tool_description: Auto detect of the embedded subtitles/watermarks in the video and auto remove them by AI technology.
name: Auto Video Watermark or Subtitles Remove
title: Auto Video Watermark or Subtitles Remove
tool_name: Auto Video Watermark or Subtitles Remove

api_list.name: Open Account
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://auto-video-watermark-or-subtitles-remove.p.rapidapi.com/user/create"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "auto-video-watermark-or-subtitles-remove.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
